title: The compleat gentleman fashioning him absolute in the most necessary & commendable qualities concerning minde or bodie that may be required in a noble gentleman. By Henry Peacham, Mr. of Arts sometime of Trinity Coll: in Cambridge.
author: Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?
publisher: Anno 1622 Imprinted at London [by John Legat] for Francis Constable, and are to bee sold at his shop at the white lio[n] in Paules churchyard,
notes: The title page is engraved and signed "Fr. Delaram. sculp. Anno 1622".
The page after the first 172 is numbered 166.
X4 is replaced by cancel fold X4.5; another fold ² Y4.5 inserted after ¹Y4. Variant: with cancellandum X4.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
